meanings.definition: A hypothetical elementary particle believed to be the quantum of time.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study chronons to understand time better.
meanings.sent2: In quantum mechanics, chronons are considered the building blocks of time.
meanings.sent3: The chronons in the experiment seemed to have a mind of their own!
meanings.sent4: Time felt like a river made of tiny chronons flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The concept of chronons makes time feel tangible and measurable.

meanings.definition: The smallest possible unit of time in the theory of quantum mechanics.
meanings.sent1: One chronon is the tiniest slice of time imaginable.
meanings.sent2: Quantum mechanics deals with the idea of chronons as indivisible time units.
meanings.sent3: The chronons in the clock seemed to be racing each other!
meanings.sent4: Each moment is made up of countless invisible chronons ticking away.
meanings.sent5: The idea of chronons helps us grasp the fleeting nature of time.
